ComicInfo.Title: A Look at Correspondence Courses; How to Become a Writer of Westerns; Vacancy Sign; Medallions with a Message; The War on Law; The Girl and the Butterfly; Cracked Visits a U.S. Army Camp; How Madison Ave. Can Use Celebrities in Advertising; The Hippies' Coloring Book; Fly Me to the Moon; Old, Old Fashions for the New Generation; Help! I'm in the Pacific
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini leave behind a vacancy sign after escaping prison.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:38:33. [Issue ID 250440]

ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,John Severin,Vic Martin,Tony Tallarico,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Lugoze
